sqlMap.select: select cl.code ncCategoryId, m.name, mea.name measurement from fhdba.bd_material_v m left join fhdba.bd_measdoc mea on m.pk_measdoc = mea.pk_measdoc, fhdba.bd_marbasclass cl where m.dr = 0 and cl.pk_marbasclass = m.pk_marbasclass and m.def8 = 'Y' AND m.pk_marbasclass IN (SELECT pk_marbasclass FROM bd_marbasclass WHERE CODE IN (10699,10701,10702,10703,10704,10705,10706,11201, 11202,11203,11204,11205,11299,11301,11302) ) group by m.name,cl.code, mea.name
sqlMap.update:
INSERT INTO product_info (nc_category_id,name,measurement) VALUES
(#list[].ncCategoryId#, #list[].name#,#list[].measurement# )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE nc_category_id=VALUES(nc_category_id),measurement = VALUES(measurement)
sqlMap.select: select m.pk_material ncId, m.code, m.name productName, bg.code customsClearanceId, bg.name customsClearanceName, gb.risetaxes, gb.exportaxesback , mea.name measurement, m.materialspec specification, m.materialtype model, m.dr, case when m.def14='~' then '1.0000' else m.def14 end unitUseRate from fhdba.bd_material_v m left join fhdba.bd_material_v bg on m.def17 = bg.pk_material left join fhdba.bd_measdoc mea on m.pk_measdoc = mea.pk_measdoc inner join fhdba.bd_goodscode gh on m.pk_goodscode = gh.pk_goodscode inner join fhdba.bd_goodstaxes gb on gb.pk_goodscode = gh.pk_goodscode, fhdba.bd_marbasclass cl where gb.dr = 0 and gh.dr = 0 and cl.pk_marbasclass = m.pk_marbasclass and gb.startdate <= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and gb.enddate > to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND m.pk_marbasclass IN (SELECT pk_marbasclass FROM bd_marbasclass WHERE CODE IN (10699,10701,10702,10703,10704,10705,10706,11201, 11202,11203,11204,11205,11299,11301,11302) ) and m.def8 = 'Y'
sqlMap.update:
insert into product_ware(nc_id,product_name,code,customs_clearance_id,customs_clearance_name, risetaxes,exportaxesback,specification,model,unit_use_rate,dr) VALUES
(#list[].ncId#, #list[].productName#, #list[].code#,#list[].customsClearanceId#,#list[].customsClearanceName# ,#list[].risetaxes#,#list[].exportaxesback#,#list[].specification# ,#list[].model#,#list[].unitUseRate#,#list[].dr#)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE nc_id=VALUES(nc_id), product_name = VALUES (product_name), code = VALUES(code), customs_clearance_id = VALUES(customs_clearance_id), customs_clearance_name = VALUES(customs_clearance_name), risetaxes = VALUES(risetaxes), exportaxesback = VALUES(exportaxesback), specification = VALUES(specification), model = VALUES(model), unit_use_rate = VALUES(unit_use_rate), dr = VALUES (dr)

update product_info p,product_category s,product_category m,product_category b set p.small_category_id = s.id,p.mid_category_id = m.id,p.big_category_id = b.id,p.category_name = s.name where p.nc_category_id = s.id and s.parent_id = m.id and m.parent_id = b.id
update product_ware w,product_info p set w.product_info_id = p.product_id where w.product_name = p.name
